required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug-drug Interaction Study of Famitinib Malate With a Proton Pump Inhibitor in Healthy Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Single-arm, Open-label and Fixed-sequence Study to Evaluate the Effect of Omeprazole on Pharmacokinetics of Famitinib Malate in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective is to evaluate the effect of omeprazole on the pharmacokinetics of famitinib malate in healthy adult subjects.
The secondary objective is to evaluate the safety after famitinib malate alone or combined administration with omeprazole in healthy adult subjects.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This is a single-arm, open-label and fixed-sequence drug interaction study.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of adverse events/serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from ICF signing date to approximate day 30

arm_group.description: The study will have only one study group in a fixed-sequence type of design.

intervention.description: famitinib malate, 25 mg on study day 1; omeprazole, 40 mg, qd on study day 10-14, 16-22; famotine malate together with omeprazole, on study day 15.

facility.name: Zhongda Hospital, Affiliated to Southest University
